item.title: The shortest and longest government shutdowns in U.S. history
item.description: The government shut down on Oct. 1. Here’s a look at the shortest and longest government shutdowns in U.S. history.

item.title: Justice Dept. sues to block California congressional map that favors Democrats
item.description: California voters approved the new map, a counterpunch to Trump-backed redistricting in Texas and other red states, via a ballot measure this month.
